name: MongoDB Command Generator
description: Runs a database command (as long as the command result is less than 16MB in size).

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: hosts
parameters.description: A list of node names, like node1.foo.com:27017. Port is optional, it is 27017 by default.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The name of the user (if authentication is required).

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the user (if authentication is required).

parameters.name: admin
parameters.description: Does authentication use the admin database?

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: The coomand to run on the database
